This lab is to be done in class (completed outside of class if need be). You can collaborate with your classmates, but you must identify their names above, and you must submit **your own** lab as an knitted HTML file on Canvas, by Sunday 11:59pm, this week.

Learning outcomes
===

Students will be able to use advanced R plotting tools, including ggplot2
Students will be able to apply the concept of vizualization layers (grammer of graphics)

STAT 645 Project milestone (20 point deduction if not completed)
===

Copy your code from your project files to show your doing this, but do not evaluate here.

1. Complete the process of importing data.
2. Complete the process of exploring and cleaning the data.
3. Create some preliminary plots along the way to visualize important aspects of your data as they relate to your research interests.
